body.bibl: McVey, Kathleen Elizabeth. “The Memra on the Life of Severus of Antioch, Composed by George, Bishop of the Arab Tribes: A Critical Edition of the Syriac Text, English Translation, and Literary and Historical Commentary.” Ph.D. dissertation, Harvard University, 1977.
